name: Hauppauge
headline: Trusted Hauppauge Electricians for Busy Corporate Centers
subheadline: Same-day troubleshooting and tenant improvements for the Hauppauge Industrial Park and surrounding neighborhoods.

landmarks.name: Hauppauge Industrial Park
landmarks.description: Daily service calls for corporate campuses and light manufacturing suites that need fast electrical maintenance without downtime.

landmarks.name: Blydenburgh County Park
landmarks.description: Lighting retrofits and EV charger installs keep the north shore recreation areas safe after sunset.

landmarks.name: County Government Complex
landmarks.description: Emergency backup generator testing for Suffolk County offices on Veterans Memorial Highway.

drivingDirections.fromHq: Head east on Portion Road, continue onto Smithtown Blvd, then take NY-347 E to County Rd 67 to reach Hauppauge's business district.

localPhotos.alt: Modern office park building in Hauppauge
Tree-lined trail in Blydenburgh County Park

serviceHighlights: Tenant improvement build-outs with same-week permitting
Lighting and controls for county facilities

review.quote: Berman Electric upgraded our warehouse service without interrupting production.
The dual Level 2 chargers at our county garage were live the same afternoon.
Parking lot LED conversion cut our electric bill in half and brightened security.

seo.title: Hauppauge Electricians | Berman Electric
seo.description: Licensed Hauppauge electricians keeping Suffolk County businesses online with same-day service calls, EV chargers, and lighting retrofits.

name: Patchogue
headline: Historic Patchogue Waterfront Electrical Experts
subheadline: Specialized crews for south shore restaurants, marinas, and arts venues along Main Street and the riverfront.

landmarks.name: Patchogue Theatre
landmarks.description: Show-ready lighting checks, dimming systems, and backup power rehearsed with venue staff.

landmarks.name: Patchogue River Marinas
landmarks.description: Shore power pedestals and dock lighting hardened for salty air conditions.

landmarks.name: Blue Point Brewery
landmarks.description: Process control wiring and steam boiler circuits maintained on off-production hours.

drivingDirections.fromHq: Take Nicolls Rd south, merge onto NY-27 E, and exit at Route 112 to reach downtown Patchogue's waterfront.

localPhotos.alt: South shore marina slips at sunset

review.quote: Our prep kitchen was back online before the dinner rush.
Theatre lighting scenes run flawlessly after their retrofit.
Dockside chargers made our marina reservations spike.

seo.title: Patchogue Electricians | Berman Electric
seo.description: Local Patchogue electricians for waterfront businesses, marinas, and Main Street venues. Fast emergency response and corrosion-resistant installs.

name: Stony Brook

landmarks.name: Stony Brook University Hospital
landmarks.description: Critical power testing and generator paralleling completed before morning rounds.

landmarks.name: Charles B. Wang Center
landmarks.description: Event lighting rigs and cultural center exhibit power on curated schedules.

landmarks.name: Avalon Park & Preserve
landmarks.description: Pathway lighting audits to keep evening walkers safe in the village.

drivingDirections.fromHq: Drive north on Nicolls Rd, follow signs to Stony Brook University, then continue onto North Country Rd for village service calls.

serviceHighlights: Clean power solutions for research labs
Smart panel installs for Three Village homes

review.quote: The isolation transformers keep our instruments rock steady.
